name: Una Kravets
bio:
Una is a front-end developer, architecting design systems and building software prototypes on the Cloud Platform team at [IBM Design](https://www.ibm.com/design/), Austin. She is a core member of the [Open Design Foundation](http://opendesign.foundation/) and founder of both the Sassy DCand ATX Sass Meetups.

She's a performance nerd, but also loves illustration, hand-lettering, and audiobooks.
